subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Cycling, Road
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Joaquim Rodríguez took over the lead after the grueling 16th stage, a 115-mile route that Fränk Schleck of Luxembourg won in 5 hours 49 minutes 56 seconds.
snippet: Joaquim Rodríguez took over the lead after the grueling 16th stage, a 115-mile route that Fränk Schleck of Luxembourg won in 5 hours 49 minutes 56 seconds.
